column5: Will...aka Fishnsled posted earlier this week about going in for an angiogram.  Good luck today buddy!!!  Hope they find all is clear!  I'll call you this weekend...and don't forget to call us if you need anything.  Don't even think about shovelling snow this weekend...no matter how little falls!
Good luck Will.  I'm sure everything will be fine!!!  Sinker
Best of luck to ya Will!

Good Luck Will!!!  I had one done a couple of months ago, very scarey procedure for a first timer... but after it's done, it's a piece of cake!!!  You'll feel a lot better when they find the cure for what ails ya!!!
yeah you bet, good luck my friend

I'll call you today or tomorrow Will! Hope it went well. I got a messge from Will earlier this week, giving the the what for, for not inviting him up to Simcoe over Xmas... Then he realized that if he had a problem on the ice he would; a) be relying on us to get him back to shore for help, then he came to his senses, realizing that if the fish were biting, he may end up a cooked goose!!!!! Being a long standing member of this board, FnS would understand that the bite is on, well, the bite is on!!!! there wouldn't be any room for his carcass with the power auger on the sled! c) he's a little too big for perch bait!  Just ribbin yah bud! Talk soon! HH
Does anyone have an update on this yet?

We called his place last night and talked to his better half...  Great news:  It all went great...no issues at all!!!  He's at home recovering comfortably.  Bad news:  I told him if we got any snow this weekend I'd be over to shovel it....with 15cm coming today and tonight, guess what I'll be doing in the morning?? LOL.  All worked out great...I'm sure he'll update himself when he's back online.
That's great news, thanks for the update Cliff.  Now go get your shovel bud  Joey
I knew it would all be fine. I just had a feeling.  Great news for sure!  Sinker
Yah, I spoke with him this morning, he's doing well, somepain, but a good nurse will help him with that! HH
